name: Holy Purple Cow! Grape and Milk Together
description: I must have been about four because I remember this happening in the kitchen of our house on Madison Street. I loved milk, especially flavored milk--chocolate, strawberry, banana. Those flavors, begat by mixing a purchased syrup or a Nestle's...
recipeIngredient: 1 pint quality ice cream, vanilla or other
1 5.5-6oz can of concord grape juice concentrate*

recipeInstructions.text: Blend all ingredients together until homogeneous. Divide among four chilled 10-ounce glass tumblers, and serve immediately.
